faqs.a: We are located at 123 Health St., Springfield. Free parking is available behind the building.
We are open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
We accept Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, and Medicare.

faqs.q: What should I bring for my first visit?
faqs.a: Please bring a photo ID, insurance card, and a list of current medications.
Please cancel at least 24 hours before your appointment to avoid a fee.

covid_policy: Masks are optional but recommended for symptomatic patients.
